title: E1-S1: Report issue with photo
body: As a user, I want to report an issue with a photo, category, and short description so I can alert the community and earn points. Acceptance: Photo + category + short description saved; response 2xx.

title: E1-S2: List and view issues
body: As a user, I want to view reported issues on a map and list so I can understand what's happening in my area. Acceptance: Map and list return same canonical IDs.

title: E1-S3: Create/RSVP event for issue
body: As a user, I want to organize a clean-up event for a reported issue, setting a date, time, and volunteer goal. Acceptance: Organizer can set date/time and target; RSVP increments count.

title: E1-S4: Mark event solved with after-photo & reward
body: As an organizer, I want to mark an event as 'Solved' by uploading an 'after' photo, automatically rewarding participants. Acceptance: After-photo stored; participants credited; transaction recorded.

title: E1-S5: Points ledger & profile display
body: As a user, I want to see my Safa Points (SP) and transaction history in my profile. Acceptance: User profile shows current SP and history.
